product_name: Salomon Sense Mantra 2 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The lightweight Salomon Sense Mantra 2 Trail-Running Shoes are built for forefoot and midfoot strikers looking for a shoe that offers natural motion without sacrificing cushioning. Breathable synthetic mesh uppers feature supportive thermoplastic urethane overlays that wrap insteps for lateral stability. Seamless construction cradles feet for a precise and supportive fit. Quicklace(TM) lacing system with friction-free eyelets takes just a single pull for a perfect fit; lace pocket hides laces away. Protective toe caps guard against bumps and abrasion. Synthetic mesh linings wick moisture away from feet for dry comfort. Dual-density EVA midsoles protect against trail impacts. OS Tendon thermoplastic urethane frames run along the outsoles of the shoes to facilitate better heel-to-toe transitions and push-off efficiency. 6mm heel-to-toe drop positions this shoe as a transition between a barefoot style and a traditional running shoe. Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the Salomon Sense Mantra 2 Trail-Running Shoes provide tenacious grip.
